name: 2D Platformer (Shameer)
description: Early Prototype of a game made in Unity. This is a platformer game which consists of 2d gameplay mechanics. The player has to collect all the collectibles within the level and reach to the end. Gameplay elements consists on moving platforms, bouncing platforms, moving objects, jumping on platforms and avoiding bullets.  There are multiple levels to this game. Once you reach to the end of the level, the next level will commence.
